cancelDeleteDataUsageLabel.description: Label on button in confirmation dialog to cancel deletion of data usage

chromeExtension.description: Entry in data usage table for a chrome extension

dataSavingsColumnHeading.description: Heading for a table column that displays the data savings.

dataSavingsFormat.description: Message to display data savings obtained by using this extension.

dataSavingsLabel.description: Label for data savings achieved by using Data Saver

dataSavingsTooltipMessage.description: Tooltip message for info icon next to the 'Data Savings' column header
dataSavingsTooltipMessage.message: Pages accessed using private connections (HTTPS) or in incognito tabs will not be optimized or seen by Google.

dataUsageBreakDownTitle.description: Title for a table that displays data usage breakdown.

dataUsageColumnHeading.description: Heading for a table column that displays the data usage.

dataUsageLabel.description: Label for total data usage when using Data Saver

deleteDataConfirmationHeading.description: Heading on confirmation dialog to delete all data usage.

deleteDataConfirmationMessage.description: Message displayed in confirmation dialog to delete all data usage.
deleteDataConfirmationMessage.message: All data usage statistics will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Are you sure?

deleteDataUsageLabel.description: Label on button in confirmation dialog to delete data usage

detailedDataUsageLinkText.description: Text in link to navigate to detailed data usage page.

extDesc.description: Description of this Chrome extension. Displayed in Chrome Web Store. [CHAR LIMIT=132]
extDesc.message: Reduces data usage by using Google servers to optimize pages you visit.

extName.description: Name of this Chrome extension. [CHAR LIMIT=45]

labelDataSaverOff.description: Label on checkbox used to toggle data saver when data saver is off.

labelDataSaverOn.description: Label on checkbox used to toggle data saver when data saver is on.

labelDaysFormat.description: Label on tab to view data usage for given number of days

labelHoursFormat.description: Label on tab to view data usage for given number of hours

labelOneDay.description: Label on tab to view data usage for 1 day

labelOneHour.description: Label on tab to view data usage for 1 hour

learnMoreLinkText.description: Text in the link which takes users to more information about this extension.

loading.description: Message displayed when data usage is being loaded.

originalSizeColumnHeading.description: Heading for a table column that displays the original size.

resetData.description: Label on button to reset data usage.

siteColumnHeading.description: Heading for a table column that displays the hostname of the website visited.

sizeFormatBytes.description: Message to display data size in bytes.

sizeFormatGb.description: Message to display data size in gigabytes.

sizeFormatKb.description: Message to display data size in kilobytes.

sizeFormatMb.description: Message to display data size in megabytes.

sizeFormatTb.description: Message to display data size in terabytes.

versionNotCompatible.description: Message shown to users when the version of Chrome is not compatible with this extension.
versionNotCompatible.message: This version of Chrome is not compatible with this extension. Please update Chrome to the latest version. M41 Beta is the first supported version.
